title: ‘Halo’ Actor Pablo Schreiber Has Message For Fans Who Disagree With Master Chief Helmet Coming Off
description:
The Halo television series on Paramount Plus has become a rather divisive endeavor. In fact, Halo star Pablo Schreiber recently agreed with one criticism against the series, and that’s that he participated in a sex scene as his character Master Chief. As for another criticism, however, he has a message for fans that disagree about [...]

The post ‘Halo’ Actor Pablo Schreiber Has Message For Fans Who Disagree With Master Chief Helmet Coming Off appeared first on ScreenGeek.
